attributes.action: To disregard the petition of a second EU referendum
attributes.additional_details: We don't get the opportunity to have a second General election when the party that wins are only a 26-30% vote with only a 35-40% turn out
attributes.background: We the undersigned feel it would be highly undemocratic and unfair on the majority vote to leave the EU to hold another referendum just because the remain campaign and its supporters don't agree with the outcome.
